title: The Cure - Fuse Rocks the Garden broadcast [June 20th, 2008] AVI
description:
This torrent is a AVI file of The Cure&#039;s performance for the FUSE network&#039;s "Rock the Gardens" series that was aired on June 20th, 2008 commercial free.

Recorded onto a DVD-R using DVD Recorder > Decrypted by DVD Decrypter to VOB file using Direct Stream Copy mode > Converted to xviD AVI using Allok Video to MP4 Converter 23.976 framerate and 320kbps audio mp3 > Trimmed the beginning and ends using SolveigMM AVI Trimmer to cut off Spanish soap operas my family was watching before.

If that description doesn&#039;t satisfy you, don&#039;t download and wait for FUSE to air it again.

Aired setlist was as follows:

Underneath The Stars, Pictures of You, The Perfect Boy, Hot Hot Hot, The Only One, The End of the World, Lovesong, Sleep When I&#039;m Dead, Push, Friday I&#039;m In Love, Inbetween Days, Just Like Heaven, Baby Rag Dog Book.

Thanks to COF for posting setlist, and thanks to Olivier, Vince, Kate, Rev Heron, Cat & Chris for the live reports.

I will be extracting the audio as soon as I can, but given that I don&#039;t know how to rip it to FLAC I might just high quality mp3 it on The Pirate Bay or something.

Also, if you run into any troubles playing the file, download the xviD codec at http://www.xvidmovies.com/codec/ or just use VLC Media player - http://www.videolan.org

Enjoy.
